All watches are checked by our master watchmakers, this ensures they are serviced and polished when necessary with the utmost care and attention to detail. All our watches come with the Xupes comprehensive warranty scheme, this item is covered by the 24 Months Comprehensive. We also run a strict history and authenticity check of every watch as part of our Xupes Promise.* We rate the condition of all items on a scale out of 10. If we mark a watch as 10/10 this means the watch is in unworn condition complete with all manuals, box, and manufacturers warranty (details of which will be specified in the description). For older watches we may choose to mark them as 10/10 if they are in immaculate condition. If a watch is marked as 9/10 this generally means the box and papers have been misplaced or the watch may be a little below the 'immaculate' standard. 'Unworn' applies to a item that was recently purchased new and has not been worn. If an item of Jewellery is marked as 10/10, this means it is in immaculate condition and 'as good as new'. Local Taxes All items are inclusive of all local taxes but may be subject to additional charges for importation and taxes local to the client. Guarantee & Returns Policy In compliance with distance selling regulations we offer all clients the opportunity to return items within 30 days of receipt. About Xupes Xupes is a web based company dealing in fine watches, jewellery, art and antiques and associated luxury goods. The company was established in 2009 and bases its trading on strict policies of absolute honesty, integrity and professionalism. We consider you, the client, as paramount to the success of our business. We aim to deliver a personal service to make you comfortable in your new purchase offering luxury products at some of the most reasonable prices on the web. All our products are fully backed by our guarantees giving you total piece of mind. The Company combines considerable expertise and knowledge in the watch, jewellery, art and antiques fields and aims to offer rare and interesting items which not only compliment each other but appeal to the discerning buyer. We also have exclusive access to one of the most exciting photographic archives accumulated over the past 65 years. Xupes Limited is a registered company in England & Wales registration no. 07010901. VAT No: 120661158. Xupes Limited is not associated with any of the brands listed. Watches We sell only branded watches. All are provided with a minimum 12 month warranty (unless otherwise stated) from Xupes Ltd. The watch movement is covered under this warranty however this does not apply to any inappropriate damage caused by mistreatment of your watch. The warranty does not cover damage to bracelets, cases, crystals/glasses, or damage arising from use in water. We do not cover accidental damage or loss. Our Xupes warranty is not transferable. We provide every watch sold with a free replacement valuation, which can be used for insurance purposes. In addition clients receive a statutory 7 day money back guarantee on all watches, which we deliver via the mail providing they are returned to us in their original condition. All returns must be agreed with Xupes beforehand. Jewellery We sell fine jewellery and work with specialist suppliers to bring you honest and accurate descriptions. We maintain a full photographic record of all pieces sold. We are unable to accept returns where items have been specifically modified or made for a client and encourage our clients to physically view and try items prior to purchase. We can however modify items (such as resizing rings) although there may be a small charge. Returns of items sent by mail will be accepted for the statutory 7 day period after delivery. However any tampering or alteration will invalidate this guarantee. All returns must be agreed with Xupes beforehand. Art, Antiques & Photography All art, antiques and photography are sold as described and are also fully guaranteed to be as described. In the unlikely event of an error in the description we will accept the return for a full refund of the costs. We pride ourselves in our honesty and integrity and again offer a statutory 7 day money back guarantee on all items, which are sent via the mail providing that these are returned to us in their original condition. All returns must be agreed with Xupes beforehand.
